story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to Disney World. He had always wanted to go there and see all the sights. He was especially excited to see Mickey Mouse.

next_options.0: The lion enjoyed his time at Disney World, especially seeing Mickey Mouse
next_options.1: The lion was disappointed with Disney World and thought it was overrated

story_parts.text: The lion enjoyed his time at Disney World, especially seeing Mickey Mouse. He loved all the rides and attractions, and he especially loved the food. He was so happy that he got to experience everything that he had always wanted to see.

next_options.0: The lion continued to enjoy his time at Disney World, going on more rides and trying more food
next_options.1: The lion's time at Disney World came to an end and he had to go home

story_parts.text: The lion continued to enjoy his time at Disney World, going on more rides and trying more food. He loved everything about the park and he was especially excited to meet some of the characters. He was thrilled to meet Mickey Mouse and he even got to have his picture taken with him. The lion was having the time of his life and he was so glad that he had finally gotten to experience Disney World.
